com.viaoa.jfc.scroller

Class OAScrollerUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • com.viaoa.jfc.scroller.OAScrollerUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, ChangeListener, SwingConstants

    public class OAScrollerUI
extends ComponentUI
implements SwingConstants, MouseListener, ChangeListener, PropertyChangeListener
    Vertical scroller, used for scrolling toolbar
    Author:
    vvia
